description.value:
Youâ€™re so close to nature that you can summon fragments of natural magic to aid you.

Prerequisites: Wis 11.

Benefit: Select one of the following 0-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.gEPdddzbgRAAa6j3]{detect affliction}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.xCtwxPiV5ionTNal]{fatigue}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.kNURbWD9d5768exU]{token spell}. You can cast this spell three times per day as a spell-like ability, using your character level as your caster level. The key ability score for this spell is Wisdom.

Special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you must choose a different spell from the list.
